room_title: Escape room "The Hike" by Escape Again Rooms in Houston
review: Our entire group loved it! Six of us aged 18 to 60 escaped from the Hike. It was a great hour filled with puzzles and fun. Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "The Hike" by Escape Again Rooms in Houston
review: We had such a blast! Hosted a birthday party - super easy and accommodating. Everyone that works there is great! The Hike was definitely a favorite.

room_title: Escape room "The Hike" by Escape Again Rooms in Houston
review: Super fun! Staff was excellent! Enjoyed going on "The Hike"!

room_title: Escape room "The Hike" by Escape Again Rooms in Houston
review: Great fun! Creative, challenging, and just enough components. Our first ever escape room and we are excited to try more especially at Escape Again Rooms. Awesome experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Hike" by Escape Again Rooms in Houston
review: Convenient location, and the puzzles/riddles are challenging and rewarding. I'm definitely going back for the other rooms!
